function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of formal quality appraisal tool used in the review","Impact":"Potential inclusion of low-quality or irrelevant studies","Mitigation":"Implement a formal quality appraisal tool for future reviews","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Reviewers, researchers, readers","Owner":"Review team"},{"Description":"Considerable overlap between themes and papers crossing themes","Impact":"Difficulty in categorizing and analyzing the data","Mitigation":"Refine the themes and review process to minimize overlap","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Reviewers, researchers","Owner":"Review team"},{"Description":"Connection allocation based on reviewers' interests and areas of expertise","Impact":"Potential bias in the selection of papers for full-text screening","Mitigation":"Implement random allocation of papers to reviewers to reduce bias","Technologies":"N/A","People":"Reviewers, researchers","Owner":"Review team"}]}
